featured.text: Just like their cousins grasshoppers and crickets, wetas are able to “sing” by rubbing their leg parts together, or against their lower bodies.

definition.zh_def: 一種昆蟲，通常具有長腿和翅膀，能夠跳躍和發出聲音。
definition.en_def: A type of insect that typically has long legs and wings, capable of jumping and making sounds.
definition.example: The grasshopper jumped from one blade of grass to another.
